verses.verse: And the fifth <S%G3991><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded, <S%G4537><s%> and I saw <S%G3708><s%> a star <S%G792><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> which had fallen <S%G4098><s%> to the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and the key <S%G2807><s%> of the bottomless <S%G12><s%> pit <S%G5421><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to him.

And he opened <S%G455><s%> the bottomless <S%G12><s%> pit; <S%G5421><s%> and smoke <S%G2586><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up out of the pit, <S%G5421><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of a great <S%G3173><s%> furnace; <S%G2575><s%> and the sun <S%G2246><s%> and the air <S%G109><s%> were darkened <S%G4656><s%> by the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of the pit. <S%G5421><s%>

And out of the smoke <S%G2586><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> locusts <S%G200><s%> upon the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and power <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> them, as the scorpions <S%G4651><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> power. <S%G1849><s%>

And they were told <S%G3004><s%> that they should not hurt <S%G91><s%> the grass <S%G5528><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> green <S%G5515><s%> thing, <S%G5515><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> tree, <S%G1186><s%> but only <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> the men <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> do not have <S%G2192><s%> the seal <S%G4973><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> on their foreheads. <S%G3359><s%>

And they were not permitted <S%G1325><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> anyone, <S%G846><s%> but to torment <S%G928><s%> for five <S%G4002><s%> months; <S%G3376><s%> and their torment <S%G929><s%> was like <S%G5613><s%> the torment <S%G929><s%> of a scorpion <S%G4651><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> it stings <S%G3817><s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

And in those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> men <S%G444><s%> will seek <S%G2212><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> and will not find <S%G2147><s%> it; and they will long <S%G1937><s%> to die <S%G599><s%> and death <S%G2288><s%> flees <S%G5343><s%> from them.

And the appearance <S%G3667><s%> of the locusts <S%G200><s%> was like <S%G3664><s%> horses <S%G2462><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> for battle; <S%G4171><s%> and on their heads, <S%G2776><s%> as it were, crowns <S%G4735><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> gold, <S%G5557><s%> and their faces <S%G4383><s%> were like <S%G5613><s%> the faces <S%G4383><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

And they had <S%G2192><s%> hair <S%G2359><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the hair <S%G2359><s%> of women, <S%G1135><s%> and their teeth <S%G3599><s%> were like <S%G5613><s%> [the teeth] of lions. <S%G3023><s%>

And they had <S%G2192><s%> breastplates <S%G2382><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> breastplates <S%G2382><s%> of iron; <S%G4603><s%> and the sound <S%G5456><s%> of their wings <S%G4420><s%> was like <S%G5613><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of chariots, <S%G716><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> horses <S%G2462><s%> rushing <S%G5143><s%> to battle. <S%G4171><s%>

And they have <S%G2192><s%> tails <S%G3769><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> scorpions, <S%G4651><s%> and stings; <S%G2759><s%> and in their tails <S%G3769><s%> is their power <S%G1849><s%> to hurt <S%G91><s%> men <S%G444><s%> for five <S%G4002><s%> months. <S%G3376><s%>

They have <S%G2192><s%> as king <S%G935><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them, the angel <S%G32><s%> of the abyss; <S%G12><s%> his name <S%G3686><s%> in Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> is Abaddon, and in the Greek <S%G3><s%> he has <S%G1673><s%> the name <S%G2192><s%> Apollyon. <S%G3686><s%>

The first <S%G1520><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> is past; <S%G565><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> woes <S%G3759><s%> are still <S%G2089><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>

And the sixth <S%G1623><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded, <S%G4537><s%> and I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from the four <S%G5064><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> of the golden <S%G5552><s%> altar <S%G2379><s%> which is before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

one saying <S%G3004><s%> to the sixth <S%G1623><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> the trumpet, <S%G4536><s%> "Release <S%G3089><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> who are bound <S%G1210><s%> at the great <S%G3173><s%> river <S%G4215><s%> Euphrates. <S%G2166><s%>"

And the four <S%G5064><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> who had been prepared <S%G2090><s%> for the hour <S%G5610><s%> and day <S%G2250><s%> and month <S%G3376><s%> and year, <S%G1763><s%> were released, <S%G3089><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that they might kill <S%G615><s%> a third <S%G5154><s%> of mankind. <S%G444><s%>

And the number <S%G706><s%> of the armies <S%G4753><s%> of the horsemen <S%G2461><s%> was two <S%G7046><s%> <S%G3461><s%> hundred <S%G7046><s%> <S%G3461><s%> million <S%G7046><s%>; <S%G3461><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of them.

And this <S%G3779><s%> is how <S%G3779><s%> I saw <S%G3708><s%> in the vision <S%G3706><s%> the horses <S%G2462><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who sat <S%G2521><s%> on them: [the riders] had <S%G2192><s%> breastplates <S%G2382><s%> [the color] of fire <S%G4447><s%> and of hyacinth <S%G5191><s%> and of brimstone; <S%G2306><s%> and the heads <S%G2776><s%> of the horses <S%G2462><s%> are like <S%G5613><s%> the heads <S%G2776><s%> of lions; <S%G3023><s%> and out of their mouths <S%G4750><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> and smoke <S%G2586><s%> and brimstone. <S%G2303><s%>

A third <S%G5154><s%> of mankind <S%G444><s%> was killed <S%G615><s%> by these <S%G3778><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> plagues, <S%G4127><s%> by the fire <S%G4442><s%> and the smoke <S%G2586><s%> and the brimstone, <S%G2303><s%> which proceeded <S%G1607><s%> out of their mouths. <S%G4750><s%>

For the power <S%G1849><s%> of the horses <S%G2462><s%> is in their mouths <S%G4750><s%> and in their tails; <S%G3769><s%> for their tails <S%G3769><s%> are like <S%G3664><s%> serpents <S%G3789><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> heads; <S%G2776><s%> and with them they do <S%G91><s%> harm. <S%G91><s%>

And the rest <S%G3062><s%> of mankind, <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> were not killed <S%G615><s%> by these <S%G3778><s%> plagues, <S%G4127><s%> did not repent <S%G3340><s%> of the works <S%G2041><s%> of their hands, <S%G5495><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> as not to worship <S%G4352><s%> demons, <S%G1140><s%> and the idols <S%G1497><s%> of gold <S%G5552><s%> and of silver <S%G693><s%> and of brass <S%G5470><s%> and of stone <S%G3035><s%> and of wood, <S%G3585><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> see <S%G991><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> walk; <S%G4043><s%>

and they did not repent <S%G3340><s%> of their murders <S%G5408><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> of their sorceries <S%G5331><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> of their immorality <S%G4202><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> of their thefts. <S%G2809><s%>
